traits.description: Timmy gets a rush from hurting people, and never minds the sight of blood or death. he is four times as likely to start a social fight as others.
traits.name: bloodlust

traits.description: Timmy is an exceptionally agreeable and giving person. he rarely insults others and will sometimes offer kind words to brighten the moods of those around him. he also never judges people by their appearance. his agreeableness also makes him more likely to conform to prevailing opinions.
traits.name: kind

traits.description: Timmy always says exactly what's on his mind, especially if it's bugging him. That tends to rub people the wrong way.
traits.name: abrasive

traits.description: Timmy is too smart for his own good. he learns everything much faster than everyone, but can be quite eccentric.
traits.name: toosmart

traits.description: Timmy likes to fight up close and personal. his accuracy is greatly increased in melee combat, but he'll be very unhappy if asked to carry a ranged weapon.
traits.name: brawler

traits.description:
Timmy likes to be up during the night, and sleep during the day.

he gets a mood bonus if awake at night (23h-6h) and mood loss if awake during the day (11h-18h).

he doesn't get a mood penalty for being in the dark.
traits.name: nightowl

traits.description: Timmy needs a really impressive bedroom. he gets a mood loss if he doesn't get what he wants.
traits.name: greedy

traits.description: For Timmy, it's degrading to have a less impressive bedroom than someone else. he gets a mood loss if any colonist has a more impressive bedroom.
traits.name: jealous

traits.description: Timmy has forsaken physical comforts and enjoyments in favor of a simple, pure lifestyle. he will become unhappy if he has a bedroom that's too impressive. he also dislikes fancy food and prefers to eat raw. he never judges others by their appearance.
traits.name: ascetic

traits.description: Timmy is romantically attracted to people of his own gender.
traits.name: gay

traits.description: Timmy is romantically attracted to both men and women.
traits.name: bisexual

traits.description: Timmy has no sexual attraction to anyone at all.
traits.name: asexual

traits.description: Timmy's voice has a particularly grating, nasal quality to it, and he tends to talk in barked, garbled phrases. This predisposes others to dislike him.
traits.name: annoyingvoice

traits.description: Timmy breathes heavily all the time, and sweats constantly. People find it creepy.
traits.name: creepybreathing

traits.description: Timmy loves fire. he will never extinguish fires, and will occasionally go on random fire starting sprees. he will be happy around flames, and happier when wielding an incendiary weapon.
traits.name: pyromaniac

traits.description: Timmy is weak and cowardly. Even a little pain will immobilize him.
traits.name: wimp

traits.description: Timmy has remarkable kinesthetic intelligence. he seems to dance around danger with preternatural grace.
traits.name: nimble

traits.description: Timmy is slow on the uptake. he learns much slower than others.
traits.name: slowlearner

traits.description: Timmy feels limited in his feeble human body. he often dreams of being enhanced with artificial body parts or xenogenetics.
traits.name: transhumanist

traits.description: Timmy believes the human body is limited for a reason. To him, artificial body parts and xenogenes are unethical and disgusting.
traits.name: bodypurist

traits.description: Timmy feels alienated and misunderstood by other human beings. he will have a constant mood debuff, but gain a chance (50%) to get a creativity inspiration after a mental break.
traits.name: torturedartist

traits.description: Timmy's life revolves around food. he gets hungry quickly, and will occasionally be overcome with the urge to eat ravenously, even when not hungry.
traits.name: gourmand

traits.description: Timmy is always falling behind the group whenever he goes anywhere.
traits.name: slowpoke

traits.description: Timmy likes to be where he's going. he walks quicker than most people.
traits.name: fastwalker

traits.description: Timmy always moves with a sense of urgency - so much so that others often fail to keep up.
traits.name: jogger

traits.description: Timmy is utterly fascinated with chemical sources of enjoyment. Consuming recreational drugs will create a good mood, while abstaining will lead to increasing frustration over time and possibly drug binges. he will ignore directives to not use recreational drugs, and will consume more than a normal person.
traits.name: chemicalfascination

traits.description: Timmy has an unusual interest in chemical sources of enjoyment. Consuming recreational drugs will create a good mood, while abstaining will lead to increasing frustration over time and possible drug binges. he will ignore directives to not use recreational drugs, and will consume more than a normal person.
traits.name: chemicalinterest

traits.description: Timmy abhors the idea of gaining pleasure from chemicals. he strictly avoids alcohol and recreational drugs.
stats: Binging on drug mental state disabled.
Binging on drug mental state disabled.
Binging on drug mental state disabled.
Binging on drug mental state disabled.

traits.name: teetotaler

traits.description: Timmy is just naturally upbeat about his situation, pretty much all the time, no matter what it is.
traits.name: sanguine

traits.description: Timmy is naturally optimistic about life. It's hard to get him down.
traits.name: optimist

traits.description: Timmy tends to look on the bad side of life.
traits.name: pessimist

traits.description: Timmy is perenially unhappy. he has trouble sustaining a good mood even when everything is fine.
traits.name: depressive

traits.description: Timmy's will is an iron shield. he keeps going through thick and thin, when others broke down long before.
traits.name: iron-willed

traits.description: Timmy is mentally tough and won't break down under stresses that would crack most people.
traits.name: steadfast

traits.description: Timmy tends to crack under pressure.
traits.name: nervous

traits.description: Timmy is on a hair-trigger all the time. he is the first to break in any tough situation.
traits.name: volatile

traits.description: Timmy has an easy time staying on-task and focused, and gets things done much faster than the average person.
traits.name: industrious

traits.description: Timmy is a natural hard worker and will finish tasks faster than most.
traits.name: hardworker

traits.description: Timmy is a little bit lazy.
traits.name: lazy

traits.description: Timmy loves idleness and hates anything productive. he moves slowly and rarely stays focused on a task.
traits.name: slothful

traits.description: Timmy's mind is like a psychic tuning fork. he is extremely sensitive to psychic phenomena.
traits.name: psychicallyhypersensitive

traits.description: Timmy's mind is unusually sensitive to psychic phenomena.
traits.name: psychicallysensitive

traits.description: Timmy's mind is psychically out of tune with others. he isn't as affected by psychic phenomena.
traits.name: psychicallydull

traits.description: Timmy's mind works on a psychic frequency different from everyone else. he just isn't affected by psychic phenomena.
traits.name: psychicallydeaf

traits.description: Timmy has a naturally powerful immune system. he will gain immunity much faster than a normal person would, and can survive illnesses that would kill others.
traits.name: super-immune

traits.description: Timmy has an awful immune system. he gets sick more often than usual, frequently with illnesses that nobody in the colony has been afflicted by.
traits.name: sickly

traits.description: Timmy has cat-like reflexes, and excels at evading attacks.
traits.name: deftlydodger

traits.description: Timmy is not very good at getting out of the way of blows.
traits.name: sluggish

traits.description: Timmy has fragile skin and bones. he takes more damage than other people from the same blows.
traits.name: delicate

traits.description: The fewer people in Timmy's faction, the happier he is. Being alone is best of all.
traits.name: recluse

traits.description: Timmy has outstanding memory, both in terms of retaining information but also muscle memory. his skills will never decay.
traits.name: perfectmemory

traits.description: Timmy has deep knowledge of the twisted patterns of dark psychic energy. he can study unnatural entities faster than others. he will also periodically teach this inhuman knowledge to others when he gets the chance.
traits.name: occultist

traits.description: Timmy has the ability to make everyone feel better and inspire them to be the best version of themselves.
traits.name: joyous

traits.description: Timmy doesn't have basic needs like eating, sleeping, or comfort. his body is driven by some unknown mechanism, which has turned his eyes completely white.
traits.name: bodymastery

traits.description: Timmy is a peculiar person who seems fixated on horrendous ideas. Talking to him is often upsetting.
traits.name: disturbing

traits.description: Timmy is strangely intrigued by unnatural entities and is easily enthralled by them.
traits.name: voidfascination

traits.description: Timmy hates and distrusts xenos. They see them as little more than animals.
traits.name: xenophobe

traits.description: Timmy thinks aliens are exotic and interesting. They would love to get to know them more and wouldn't mind forming relationships with them.
traits.name: xenophile

traits.description: Timmy tends to let his mind drift, even in the middle of work. he may sometimes stop tasks at random.
traits.name: absent-minded

traits.description: Timmy has a screw loose, but it comes with a sharper scientific mind.
traits.name: eccentric

traits.description: Timmy strives for perfection in his work. he produces higher-quality products, but works more slowly. Failing to meet his standards causes unhappiness, and on rare occasions he may abandon a project mid-way.
traits.name: perfectionist

traits.description:
While fully capable of warfare in theory, Timmy's fight or flight instincts heavily lean towards flight, and he will try to hide or run as a first priority.

If imprisoned, he will be quite cooperative with his captors.
traits.name: coward

traits.description:
Timmy has a higher mental and physical fortitude compared to most and can more readily adapt to harsh environments in the rimworlds.

If imprisoned, he will be uncooperative with his captors.
traits.name: brave

traits.description: Minor bruises and scrapes plague Timmy, usually from tripping or falling due to poor coordination.
traits.name: clumsy

traits.description: Timmy enjoys the heat of a dry summer day. he doesn't mind working up a sweat or sleeping in warmth.
traits.name: heatinclined

traits.description: Timmy enjoys the chill of a brisk winter night. he doesn't mind shivering or sleeping in the cold.
traits.name: coldinclined

traits.description: A bomb could go off beside Timmy while he sleeps, and he would keep right on sleeping. he can't be bothered to work or defend the colony mid-nap.
traits.name: heavysleeper

traits.description: Timmy is naturally hygienic and organized. he doesn't track dirt or scatter trash, and enjoys cleaning.
traits.name: neat

traits.description: Timmy is naturally sloppy, leaving trash and dirt scattered around. At least he isn't much bothered by messy surroundings.
traits.name: slob

traits.description: Timmy struggles to take breaks or rest mid-job. he will keep working, even at the expense of his health or sleep.
traits.name: workaholic

traits.description: Timmy has never known nausea. Food poisoning and vomiting are foreign to him.
traits.name: ironstomach

traits.description: Timmy can't stand cruelty toward animals. he feels happier when nuzzled or acting as master to a tamed animal, but is more deeply upset when losing one. he also refuses to butcher animals.
traits.name: animallover

traits.description: Timmy believes in human superiority over animals. he dislikes bonding or being nuzzled, but feels satisfaction when animals die or are sold.
traits.name: animalhater

traits.description: Whether from bulk or awkward posture, Timmy has broken a few chairs in his time, and is likely to break more.
traits.name: big-boned

traits.description:
Timmy only plays by their own rules, and will roll their eyes and take it easy while doing any task they've been forced to do.

If imprisoned, he will be uncooperative with his captors.
traits.name: rebel

traits.description:
Timmy needs clear instructions on how, and when to do certain things and will only work at a normal speed when being forced to do something.

If imprisoned, he will be quite cooperative with his captors.
traits.name: submissive

traits.description: Timmy is fueled by spite. he can’t stand sharing the colony with rivals, and feels happier when one of them dies.
traits.name: vengeful

traits.description: Whether from trauma or fear of change, Timmy rejects modernity. he may lash out at machines, refuses to research, and feels satisfaction from destroying mechanoids.
traits.name: technophobe

traits.description: Timmy lives for a good time. he remembers parties fondly, and the joy lasts far longer than it does for most.
traits.name: fun-loving

traits.description: Timmy has limited mental capacity. he learns slowly and struggles with conversation, but tends to be naturally happy.
traits.name: dunce

traits.description: Timmy has trained in melee combat and learned a special move to disarm opponents.
traits.name: martialartist

traits.description: Timmy believes they belong in high society, and loves nothing more than critiquing art and brushing elbows with royalty.
traits.name: snob

traits.description: Timmy gets a sour stomach around blood or corpses. Vomiting is just part of life for him.
traits.name: squeamish

traits.description: Timmy is naturally anxious, especially in social situations. he avoids gatherings and sometimes retreats to his room to cope.
traits.name: anxious

traits.description: No amount of lovin’ is ever enough for Timmy. he tends to move between partners and seeks intimacy often.
traits.name: insatiable

traits.description: Timmy gives his body only to a spouse and would never initiate divorce. he also dislikes nudity more than most.
traits.name: prude

traits.description: An armchair and a screen are all Timmy needs to be happy. he never tires of watching television, and always feels good after.
traits.name: couchpotato

traits.description: Timmy enjoys the company of cats and gravitates toward bonding with them, but dislikes dogs.
traits.name: catperson

traits.description: Timmy enjoys the company of dogs and gravitates toward bonding with them, but dislikes cats.
traits.name: dogperson

traits.description: Timmy has a sharp, logical mind. he researches faster than most, and his rational outlook makes him less prone to mental breaks.
traits.name: prodigy

traits.description: Timmy believes animals are essential to life and society. he feels happier with more of them around, and is especially skilled at taming and training.
traits.name: menagerist

traits.description: The sea calls to Timmy. he feels happier when near the ocean or a deep river.
traits.name: oceanlover

traits.description: The mountains call to Timmy. he feels happier when near a large mountain.
traits.name: mountainlover

traits.description: Timmy hides a twisted obsession. he treats organ harvesting as a dark experiment and takes pleasure in it. Harvesting makes him happy, but going too long without fuels growing unrest.
traits.name: madsurgeon

traits.description: Timmy fights best when drunk. he grows more dangerous in melee the more intoxicated he becomes.
traits.name: drunkenmaster

traits.description: Timmy is compelled to steal, even from guests and allies, risking angering others.
traits.name: kleptomaniac

traits.description: Smokeleaf is a way of life for Timmy. he adores it and would rather die than give it up.
traits.name: stoner

traits.description: Alcohol is a way of life for Timmy. he adores drinking and would rather die than give it up.
traits.name: lush

traits.description: Timmy loves to travel and feels happiest on the move. he grows restless when staying too long in one place, but moves quickly and forages well while caravanning.
traits.name: wanderlust

traits.description: Timmy is never fully asleep or awake. he lurches along in a slow, shambler-like state, and only sleeps once every few days.
traits.name: insomniac

traits.description: Timmy has grown tired of the world. he struggles with bleak thoughts, making his personality difficult to befriend.
traits.name: worldweary

traits.description: Timmy is hardened by old emotional trauma. he feels nothing from death or loss, whether animal, colonist, family, or prisoner.
traits.name: desensitized

traits.description: Only the finest meals satisfy Timmy. he feels indifferent toward ordinary food, but savors lavish meals and gains greater joy from them.
traits.name: refinedpalate

traits.description: Through scholastic pursuit, Timmy has become well-read. he excels in science and medicine, and tends patients with greater skill.
traits.name: academian

traits.description: Timmy believes infrastructure is everything. he is a natural builder and stoneworker, constructing and mining with greater speed and efficiency.
traits.name: groundbreaker

traits.description: To Timmy, food is art. he creates beautiful, delicious meals that are almost always safe to eat.
traits.name: gastronomist

traits.description: Flora and fauna are vital to Timmy. he uses every part of plants and animals, and appreciates nature’s gifts.
traits.name: ecologist

traits.description: Timmy has an eye for silver and a silver tongue to match. he values his own goods highly, and convinces others to do the same.
traits.name: tycoon

traits.description: Timmy is strangely hypercoagulating and will bleed much more slowly than most.
traits.name: thickskinned

traits.description: Timmy is strangely hemophilic and tends to bleed much more profusely than others.
traits.name: thinskinned

traits.description: Timmy bottles up his feelings for long stretches of time. When the pressure grows too great, he may suddenly break down.
traits.name: schizoid

traits.description: Timmy finds it difficult to focus on distant targets, and prefer to get up close and personal.
traits.name: nearsighted

traits.description: Timmy could spot a target from nearly a hundred meters, yet still somehow walk into walls.
traits.name: farsighted

traits.description: Timmy's movements are smooth and graceful.
traits.name: athletic

traits.description: Timmy is so rigid, it's almost like he is souless.
traits.name: stiff

traits.description: Timmy takes care of his personal hygiene.
traits.name: goodhygiene

traits.description: Timmy doesn't care about his hygiene, and sometimes get sick from bad food.
traits.name: poorhygiene

traits.description: Timmy often gets his way with things.
traits.name: persuasive

traits.description: Timmy has never won a debate in his life.
traits.name: unconvincing

traits.description: Timmy has been in plenty of fights since he was a kid, and had built up a tolerance to injury and pain as a result.
traits.name: resilient

traits.description: Timmy lived a pampered life until now, and is unused to the brutal challenges present out in the Rim.
traits.name: fragile

traits.description: Timmy always tackle his tasks with great enthusism.
traits.name: energetic

traits.description: Timmy is slow. Sooo... slooow...
traits.name: sluggish

traits.description: Timmy always sleep like a baby.
traits.name: restful

traits.description: Timmy often has a difficult time falling asleep.
traits.name: restless

traits.description: Timmy is quite productive when it comes to work.
traits.name: efficient

traits.description: Timmy is somewhat of a bottleneck in the colony.
traits.name: inefficient

traits.description: Timmy is brave, he would stand his ground where others would scramble and run.
traits.name: valiant

traits.description: When there's a fight, Timmy is the first to run.
traits.name: craven

traits.description: Timmy likes a good fight, he will sometimes start a fight just because he can.
traits.name: rowdy

traits.description: Timmy is usually calm and collected.
traits.name: composed

traits.description: Timmy is more comfortable being in hot environment than his peers.
traits.name: heattolerant

traits.description: Timmy does not like being in the heat.
traits.name: heatintolerant

traits.description: Timmy is more comfortable being in cold environment than his peers.
traits.name: coldtolerant

traits.description: Timmy does not like being in the cold.
traits.name: coldintolerant

traits.description: Timmy has a well built body, people around he find that rather attractive.
traits.name: muscular

traits.description: Timmy looks a bit fragile, but not in a lovable way.
traits.name: frail

traits.description: Timmy doesn't eat or drink much.
traits.name: abstinent

traits.description: Timmy has a bottomless pit for a stomach.
traits.name: ravenous

traits.description: Timmy is naturally talented, he gets a headstart before everyone else.
traits.name: gifted

traits.description: Timmy is someone everyone loves to hate.
traits.name: incompetent

traits.description: Timmy takes great care in the preparation of food, he never skip a step just to have an early meal.
traits.name: patientcook

traits.description: Timmy couldn't care less about following the recipes as long as he can get food into his mouth in record time.
traits.name: impatientcook

traits.description: Timmy lives a healthy lifestyle, and wakes up feeling energetic and cheerful.
traits.name: healthy

traits.description: Timmy gets ill quite often, and seem to require more effort to get out of bed than the average person.
traits.name: chronicallyill

traits.description: Timmy is comfortable in all seasons.
traits.name: temperaturetolerant

traits.description: Timmy thinks that summer is way too hot, and winter is way too cold.
traits.name: temperatureintolerant

traits.description: Timmy has good reaction time and finds physical activities less stressful than his peers.
traits.name: coordinated

traits.description: Timmy is easily distracted and often mess up when it comes to physical activities.
traits.name: clumsy

traits.description: Timmy is what people refer to as a 'stronk boi'.
traits.name: hardy

traits.description: Timmy is so fragile, it doesn't take much to take him out of action.
traits.name: feeble

traits.description: Whether by sheer optimism or a force of personality, Timmy always manages to see the bright side of life.
traits.name: easilyamused

traits.description: Life to Timmy is an endless, boring joke that he just can't get away from.
traits.name: constantlybemused

traits.description: Timmy has an interest in understanding the workings of the world, and is able to apply his knowledge in daily life.
traits.name: inquisitive

traits.description: Gaps in Timmy's education and general lack of curiosity makes life often stressful for him.
traits.name: ignorant

traits.description: Timmy likes to keep his surroundings clean, and is used to being in an organised environment.
traits.name: tidy

traits.description: Timmy often neglect their surroundings, making it difficult for him to get work done.
traits.name: messy

traits.description: Timmy has an uncanny sixth sense for weak spots, allowing him to topple buildings, strike through armor, and hobble unnatural entities with ease.
traits.name: vanquisher

traits.description: Timmy is much more strongly affected by the beauty (or ugliness) of his surroundings and fellow persons.
traits.name: aestheticist

traits.description: Timmy might be fine with tame animals, but few things are more terrifying to him than wild or insane animals. he is prone to uncontrollable panic if any are nearby.
traits.name: agrizoophobe

traits.description: Timmy could spend hours lost between the pages of a good book - he will feel happier after spending enough time reading. However, this preoccupation with reading has caused him to slightly neglect more physical pursuits.
traits.name: bookworm

traits.description: Timmy has an overactive imagination. At random, or if he becomes too stressed, he will retreat into his imagination, resulting in a harmless mental break. After indulging his imagination in such a way, he becomes inspired.
traits.name: daydreamer

traits.description: With his bland demeanor and generic appearance, it can be easy to forget Timmy is around. Others’ opinions of him (both positive and negative) are only two-thirds as strong as normal.
traits.name: forgettable

traits.description: Fun is everything to Timmy. he never gets bored of any kind of recreation, but he needs it more frequently than others.
traits.name: hedonist

traits.description: Timmy moves swiftly and lightly.
traits.name: hotfoot

traits.description: Timmy really likes anyone he could be even a little attracted to. Sadly, the way in which he exhibits this is gross and creepy, so they tend not to like him back.
traits.name: lech

traits.description: Timmy needs someone to love with all his being. his mood soars immensely when he has a lover, but he is much more sensitive to romantic hurt, and those who spurn him also suffer.
traits.name: lovesick

traits.description: Roughing it out in the wilderness doesn't bother Timmy, but he despises being locked indoors.
traits.name: outdoorsy

traits.description: Timmy is all about the party life! he throws a party whenever he becomes inspired, and he loves attending any sort of social function.
traits.name: reveller

traits.description: Timmy is utterly at peace. he will not participate in violence, and can't mentally break. Ever.
traits.name: tranquil

traits.description: Timmy occasionally has episodes of profound insight during which he will create a schematic for a new technology. This happens more frequently when he is happier.
traits.name: visionary

traits.description: There's just something really likeable about Timmy.
traits.name: winsome

traits.description: Timmy keeps his expectations low, no matter how pampered he gets. Even if he gains a position of authority, his expectations still won't progress past the moderate level.
traits.name: humble

traits.description: Timmy tolerates those who don’t follow his beliefs. he isn't quite so upset with non-believers who violate his ideoligion's taboos, and he isn’t upset by botched conversion attempts.
traits.name: tolerant

traits.description: Timmy is very eager to convert others to his ideoligion.
traits.name: proclaimer

traits.description: Timmy constantly questions the nature and purpose of reality, personhood, and other profound topics. As a result, he may randomly come up with a new ideoligion, which he will be very passionate about spreading.
traits.name: radicalthinker

traits.description: Timmy takes any opportunity he can to arm others with knowledge. Whenever he socially interacts with someone, they gain experience in a random skill both parties can use.
traits.name: mentor

traits.description: Timmy really dislikes and distrusts those of different xenotypes. he may not mind variation in the genetics of his own kind, but even xenotypes very similar to his own are disgusting in his eyes.
traits.name: xenotypist

traits.description: Timmy is inextricably connected to a lurking, invisible presence. Day and night, it attempts to psychically torment him, and it will even infrequently attack him in the physical world.
traits.name: haunted

traits.description: Timmy knows that the best eldritch horror is a thoroughly destroyed one. he is happy to kill them, and will be content if void activity is minimal. However, he may also sometimes randomly slaughter captured ones.
traits.name: monsterhunter

traits.description: Timmy appreciates the strange forms of nonhuman entities. he will be agitated if void activity is minimal. Motivated by a strange sense of compassion, he may randomly decide to free captive entities.
traits.name: monsterlover

traits.description: Timmy yearns for the open sky and the feeling of the wind. he enjoys aerial travel of any kind, and he likes the sensation of being in high orbit.
traits.name: skybound

traits.description:
Timmy is always on the lookout for precious baubles.

Among other things, he fishes in an unorthodox manner that grants him a higher chance to find rare items instead of fish.
traits.name: treasureseeker

traits.description:
Buy Tynan's book. Otherwise, you'll find out that his melee dps and armor penetration are over NINE THOUSAND!!1!

(Timmy isn't actually any better at doing damage).
traits.name: gamedeveloper

traits.description: Timmy loves beautiful things, and really cares about how his enviroment looks.
traits.name: aesthete

traits.description: Timmy loves animals. he doesn't feel quite the same about people, though.
traits.name: animallover

traits.description: Timmy just isn't an "animal person." he doesn't like animals, and for the record, they don't seem to much like him, either.
traits.name: animalhater

traits.description: Timmy loved playing with construction toys as a child, and still enjoys the thrill of "putting things together." But he tends to be a bit lost without clear instructions to follow.
traits.name: builder

traits.description: Timmy enjoys preparing meat for cooking. his butchering speed is greatly increased, but only if he's dealing with animal corpses. he's terrible with mechanoids.
traits.name: butcher

traits.description: Timmy is claustrophobic. he is terrified of tight spaces, and thus is not a very competent miner.
traits.name: claustrophobic

traits.description: Timmy loves colder temperatures. he'll complain less than others when it's chilly, but will whine more when it's hot.
traits.name: coldlover

traits.description: Timmy can sleep through anything.
traits.name: deepsleeper

traits.description: Timmy is a bit of a dunce, and learns at a slower rate than others.
traits.name: dunce

traits.description: Timmy has a passion for food preparation. his culinary creations are quite tasty, but he tends to take a while getting them "just right."
traits.name: gourmet

traits.description: Timmy loves the heat. he'll complain less than others when it's hot, but will whine more when it's cold.
traits.name: heatlover

traits.description: he means well, but Timmy is uncoordinated, and just not very good at any sort of skilled labor.
traits.name: inept

traits.description: Timmy is unusually coordinated, and good at most any sort of skilled labor.
traits.name: coordinated

traits.description: Timmy has an exceptionally high tolerance for pain. he is unlikely to be immobilized by it.
traits.name: unstoppable

traits.description: Timmy has a high tolerance for pain.
traits.name: ironman

traits.description: Timmy will become immobilized by pain more quickly than most.
traits.name: lowpaintolerance

traits.description: Strange new ideas just appear in Timmy's mind. Researching new technologies comes easily to him, but he always seems distracted.
traits.name: inventor

traits.description: Timmy has a hard time seeing things clearly unless they are right in front of them.
traits.name: cranialnervepalsy

traits.description: Timmy has a keen eye, and can quickly spot targets.
traits.name: eagle-eyed

traits.description: Timmy is fastidious to a fault.
traits.name: neatfreak

traits.description: Timmy picks at his food, taking extra time to finish his meals.
traits.name: nibbler

traits.description: Timmy devours his meals much faster than others.
traits.name: glutton

traits.description: Timmy is really afraid of the dark.
traits.name: nyctophobe

traits.description: Timmy doesn't fear the dark at all.
traits.name: nyctophile

traits.description: Timmy refuses to accept less than his best in any endeavor, no matter how long it takes. he's less likely to fail when doing something, but he works slowly.
traits.name: perfectionist

traits.description: Even when they have the best of intentions, some people just aren't cut out for medicine. Timmy is one of those people.
traits.name: poormedic

traits.description: Timmy seems to have a knack for medical work. Patients in his care will likely fare well.
traits.name: skilledmedic

traits.description: Timmy has a natural aptitude for medical work. Between his steady, skilled hands and his inspiring bedside manner, patients in his care will have little to fear.
traits.name: mastermedic

traits.description: Timmy enjoys working with rocks. his mining speed is increased, but his lack of interest in other areas slows him down when doing other jobs. And he hates working with plants.
traits.name: rockhound

traits.description: Timmy is a modern-day Da Vinci, with a creative mind that can grasp new ideas almost effortlessly. But he's almost painfully slow when it comes to doing actual physical work.
traits.name: savant

traits.description: Timmy has always picked up skills pretty quickly.
traits.name: decentlearner

traits.description: Timmy just can't seem to help but get taken advantage of while trading. he'll pay more than he should, and still think that he got a good deal.
traits.name: sucker

traits.description: Timmy likes to haggle, and isn't bad at it. he tends to get better prices than most people.
traits.name: haggler

traits.description: Timmy always gets the best deals.
traits.name: mastertrader

traits.description: Subtlety? Diplomacy? Timmy barely even understands the meaning of the words.
traits.name: uncouth

traits.description: Timmy knows how to grease the wheels of diplomacy.
traits.name: diplomat

traits.description: Timmy has such a way with words that he always manages to cool down a tense situation. he could talk for days and people would still listen.
traits.name: masterdiplomat

traits.description: Timmy is especially vulnerable to diseases, pathogens and toxic fallout.
traits.name: weakconstitution

traits.description: Timmy's body is stronger than normal against diseases, pathogens and toxic fallout.
traits.name: strongconstitution

traits.description: Timmy is a terrible gardener. The only thing he seems able to grow is weeds.
traits.name: brownthumb

traits.description: Timmy is a great gardener. The only thing he wants is a greener world.
traits.name: greenthumb

traits.description: Timmy values the concept of a family very highly, and likes to guide young minds. Knowing that the families in the colony are happy is important to them and being a parent is one of he's dreams.
traits.name: familyoriented

traits.description: Timmy despises children. To he they're small, loud and obnoxious parasites that ruin every place they infest. Timmy actively go out of hes way to avoid having children.
traits.name: hateschildren

traits.description: Timmy has issues letting their feelings bottle up and consequentially eventually explodes from all the stress. They'll break more often than normal pawns but they'll feel massive relief for a long period of time afterwards.
traits.name: pressurecooker

traits.description: Timmy is able to keep cool under pressure, and will even perform better when there's a risk for mental breaks.
traits.name: composed

traits.description: Timmy tasted the green sludge once and can't get enough of it now. he will prefer to eat from a Nutrient Paste Dispenser over anything else.
traits.name: soylentneed

traits.description: Timmy is strangely proficient at dealing with animals of all kinds and sizes and never triggers attacks if taming attempts fail. he likes having animals in the colony, having bonded animals and especially loves getting nuzzled.
traits.name: animalwhisperer

traits.description: Timmy hates everyone equally.
traits.name: misanthrope

traits.description: Timmy was born without a sense of taste and cannot enjoy food.
traits.name: dysgeuisia

traits.description: Timmy loves to eat food with a variety of ingredients but will be upset over bland food.
traits.name: eclecticpalate

traits.description: Timmy hates violence and wouldn't hurt a fly. They'll get upset if forced to do so.
traits.name: pacifist

traits.description: Timmy suffers from a neurological disorder that makes he prone to randomly fall alseep anywhere.
traits.name: narcoleptic

traits.description: Timmy is irrationally afraid of fire and will flee the scene if not drafted. he hates getting burns.
traits.name: pyrophobia

traits.description: Timmy is afraid of the dark. They'll will be extra unhappy when in darkness and has trouble sleeping without light.
traits.name: nyctophobia

traits.description: Timmy always feels good after a good night's sleep.
traits.name: lovessleeping

traits.description: Timmy was born with a strong, healthy body. They can carry more, mine faster, deal more damage in melee combat and take reduced damage from attacks.
traits.name: goodconstitution

traits.description: Timmy was unfortunately born with a weak, feeble body. They cannot carry as much as everyone else, mine slower, deal less damage in melee and take increased damage from attacks.
traits.name: poorconstitution

traits.description: Timmy has no goals in life. No dreams, motivation or passions. It's going to take a lot to break what is left of them.
traits.name: apathetic

traits.description: Timmy has an intense fear of insects and will not hesitate to run away upon spotting one.
traits.name: entomophobia

traits.description: Having had easy access to insect meat during most of their life Timmy became accustomed to eating it to the point that he preferred it over normal meat.
traits.name: entomophagous

traits.description: Timmy loves the company of others. The more, the merrier.
traits.name: gregarious

traits.description: Timmy loves the rain. he doesn't mind being wet and gets happy during rainy weather.
traits.name: pluviophile

traits.description: There's nothing Timmy loves more than snow! No amount of snow is going to slow them down.
traits.name: chionophile

traits.description: It doesn't take much to make Timmy either really excited or to bring his mood completely down.
traits.name: moody

traits.description:
Timmy prefers to wake up early in the day to get as much work done as possible during the day.

he gets a mood boost if awake during the early hours of a day (5h-12h) and mood loss if awake during the evening (17h-0h).
traits.name: earlybird

traits.description: Timmy has grown accustomed to a tightly nit colony and loves sleeping in barracks. Preferably with many other pawns.
traits.name: communal

traits.description: Timmy likes seeing other pawns suffer and gets excited from causing damage.
traits.name: sadist

traits.description: For whatever purpose, Timmy has taught himself every swear word in the dictionary and uses this profane knowledge unconsciously in his day-to-day life.
traits.name: vulgar

traits.description: Timmy always tries to raise their fellow pawns' mood by telling jokes. Or try to, at least.
traits.name: comedian

traits.description: Timmy hates being in confined spaces.
traits.name: claustrophobic

traits.description: Timmy was born without the ability to feel pain. he is unable to experience psychic phenomena as a side effect.
traits.name: congenitalanalgesia

traits.description: Timmy loves guns! Especially shooting them. If he hits or not isn't important.
traits.name: guncrazy

traits.description: Timmy has a rare disorder that makes he extremely sensitive to pain, making anything painful so much worse.
traits.name: hyperalgesia

traits.description: Timmy's body works at a faster rate than a normal person, letting them heal faster at the cost of getting hungry quicker.
traits.name: fastmetabolism

traits.description: Timmy's body works at a slower rate than a normal person, healing much slower as a result. At least they don't eat as much.
traits.name: slowmetabolism

traits.description: Timmy just loves the heat and won't suffer any negative thoughts related to being warm. he despises being cold, though.
traits.name: thermophile

traits.description: Timmy just loves the cold and won't suffer any negative thoughts related to being cold. he despises being warm, though.
traits.name: cryophile

traits.description: Timmy enjoys the feeling of freedom that comes from being nude. he can handle clothing, but will be happier without it.
traits.name: nudist

traits.description: Timmy has no empathy. The suffering of others doesn't bother him at all. he doesn't mind if others are butchered, left unburied, imprisoned, or sold to slavery - unless it affects him. he also feels no mood boost from socializing.
traits.name: psychopath

traits.description: Timmy was taught that eating human meat is wrong and horrible. But one time, long ago, he tried it... and he liked it.
traits.name: cannibal

traits.description: For Timmy, there's something exciting about getting hurt. he doesn't know why, he's just wired differently.
traits.name: masochist

traits.description: Timmy has a knack for learning. he picks things up much faster than others.
traits.name: fastlearner

traits.description: Timmy has no need to experience the outdoors or light. he will never feel cooped up or get cabin fever and is not bothered by darkness. However, Timmy will be unhappy while outdoors.
traits.name: undergrounder

traits.description: Timmy really dislikes and distrusts men.
traits.name: misandrist

traits.description: Timmy really dislikes and distrusts women.
traits.name: misogynist

traits.description: Timmy has a fantastic memory for detail. he will lose unused skills at half the rate of other people.
traits.name: greatmemory

traits.description: Timmy has thick skin, dense flesh, and durable bones. he takes much less damage than other people from the same blows. he is extremely hard to kill.
traits.name: tough

traits.description: Timmy doesn't need as much sleep as the average person. Whether he's sleeping on a bed or on the ground, he will be fully rested in about two thirds the usual time.
traits.name: quicksleeper

traits.description: Timmy likes to have things squared away. he will work harder than most to attain this state of affairs, but his nerves can get the better of him.
traits.name: neurotic

traits.description: Timmy feels constantly nervous about everything that has to get done. he will work extremely hard to attain this state of affairs, but his nerves can easily get the better of him.
traits.name: veryneurotic

traits.description: Timmy is exceptionally beautiful, with an exotic-yet-familiar facial structure and an arresting gaze. People are attracted to him before he even opens his mouth.
traits.name: beautiful

traits.description: Timmy has a pretty face, which predisposes people to like him.
traits.name: pretty

traits.description: Timmy is somewhat ugly. This subtly repels others during social interactions.
traits.name: ugly

traits.description: Timmy is staggeringly ugly. his face looks like a cross between a drawing by an untalented child, a malformed fetus in a jar of formaldehyde, and a piece of modern art. Others must exert conscious effort to look at him while conversing.
traits.name: staggeringlyugly

traits.description: Psychic enthrallment caused by incredibly strong mental influence. Thralls don't need to sleep or have recreation, but are unable to do skilled work and engage in social interactions.
traits.name: thrall

traits.description: Timmy regenerates from any injury due to some unknown mechanism. Even if he dies, there is a chance he will come back to life shortly thereafter, so long as his body is intact.
traits.name: everliving

traits.description: Timmy underwent psycho-technological reprogramming by an insidious cult. If he gets too close to a member of the Cult of Horax, there is a chance for his programming to reactivate, causing him to instantly join them.
traits.name: compromised

traits.description: Timmy carries dozens, if not hundreds, of different strains of disease within his body. his mere presence often leads to disease outbreaks.
traits.name: pathogenic

traits.description: Timmy has the Meditation Metabolism archite gene, allowing him to use any meditation focus type.
traits.name: chanshigene

traits.description:
Timmy dislikes social pecking orders. he hates those who hold leadership positions, and disapproves of alliance with imperial institutions.

If imprisoned, he will be uncooperative with his captors.
traits.name: anarchist

traits.description:
Timmy wants to be led by others, and dislikes holding authority himself.

If imprisoned, he will be quite cooperative with his captors.
traits.name: servile

traits.description: Timmy dampens nearby psychic phenomena and is immensely resistant to direct psychic interference.
traits.name: psychicblank

traits.description: Timmy has an innate connection to the archotechs. This connection might awaken if he experiences something sufficiently grand or terrible, permanently transforming him into a powerful psycaster.
traits.name: latentpsychic

traits.description: Timmy has an innate connection to the archotechs. This connection might awaken if he experiences something sufficiently grand or terrible, permanently transforming him into a powerful psycaster.
traits.name: latentpsychic

traits.description: Timmy has an innate connection to the archotechs. This connection might awaken if he experiences something sufficiently grand or terrible, permanently transforming him into a powerful psycaster.
traits.name: latentpsychic

traits.description: Timmy has an innate connection to the archotechs. This connection might awaken if he experiences something sufficiently grand or terrible, permanently transforming him into a powerful psycaster.
traits.name: latentpsychic

traits.description: Timmy has an innate connection to the archotechs. This connection might awaken if he experiences something sufficiently grand or terrible, permanently transforming him into a powerful psycaster.
traits.name: latentpsychic

traits.description: Timmy has an innate connection to the archotechs. This connection might awaken if he experiences something sufficiently grand or terrible, permanently transforming him into a powerful psycaster.
traits.name: latentpsychic

traits.description: Timmy is a powerful psycaster with exceptional sensitivity to perturbations in the psychic field.
traits.name: awakenedaugur

traits.description: Timmy can use any meditation type. he gains psyfocus faster from meditating, and meditating takes care of his basic needs.
traits.name: awakenedchanshi

traits.description: Timmy is capable of using nearly any 1st-level psycast without expending psyfocus, so long as he has enough psyfocus to cast it in the first place.
traits.name: awakeneddeluge

traits.description: Timmy is an exceptionally versatile psycaster with a wide array of abilities. he may also develop up to two more transcendences than other awakened psychics.
traits.name: awakenederudite

traits.description: Timmy grows physically and mentally stronger with every psycast he learns.
traits.name: awakenedincarnate

traits.description: Timmy exudes an aura that empowers psycasting.
traits.name: awakenedluminary

traits.description: Timmy is a powerful psycaster, capable of passively generating psyfocus.
traits.name: awakenedmantraist

traits.description: Once a day, Timmy can draw upon a confluence of power within the psychic field, greatly enhancing his psycasting for an hour.
traits.name: awakenedperennial

traits.description: Timmy is a powerful psycaster with a vastly improved neural heat capacity and an exceptionally disciplined mind.
traits.name: awakenedsage

traits.description: Timmy draws psyfocus from consuming food.
traits.name: awakenedsiphoner

traits.description: Timmy reinforces his body with accumulated psyfocus, improving his capabilities and defenses.
traits.name: awakenedtitan

traits.description: Instead of harming him, damage taken by Timmy depletes his psyfocus (at a ratio of 4.5 damage to 1% psyfocus).
traits.name: awakenedundying

traits.description: Timmy hovers, negating movement penalties from the terrain, and he also gains armor based on the current wind level. While meditating, he causes the wind to howl.
traits.name: psychicalbatross

traits.description: Timmy grows in size and strength over time. This has no upper limit, and increases his strength, speed, and (up to a point) damage resistance; however, it also makes his easier to hit and worse at avoiding traps.
traits.name: psychicanaconda

traits.description: Every 1000% psyfocus Timmy spends summons an anima tree somewhere nearby. If he dies, he will instantly respawn at a nearby anima tree, killing the tree.
traits.name: psychicanimalume

traits.description:
Timmy can exert a form of mind control on mechanoids. When he affects mechanoids with a psycast, they may become allied with him for up to an hour. The heavier the mech, the less likely this is to work.

In the absence of an active mechhive, archites in his body will slowly synthesize various mechanoid chips.
traits.name: psychicapocriton

traits.description: Timmy warps nearby electromagnetic currents. he inflicts EMPs via attacks and psycasts, is immune to EMPs himself, and has improved sight. This control over electric currents even extends to his own organs, protecting him against heart attacks and some forms of coma.
traits.name: psychicarcturan

traits.description: Aided by a psychic sense, Timmy can easily visualize how to assemble or break down objects in his immediate vicinity. his psychic sensitivity increases up the rate at which he works with plants and buildings, and affects how much damage he does to buildings.
traits.name: psychicbeaver

traits.description: Word psycasts used by Timmy cost +7.5% psyfocus, but affect all nearby valid targets. The radius of this effect is equal to twice his psylink level.
traits.name: psychicbellbird

traits.description: Timmy is surrounded by a protective immaterial presence, which attacks nearby foes and attempts to divert incoming blows.
traits.name: psychicbluejay

traits.description: Timmy generates rock chunks with each psycast (and sometimes also makes more valuable metallic resources). On using a psycast of the highest level, there is a 10% chance a meteorite will fall somewhere nearby.
traits.name: psychicbouldermit

traits.description: Timmy emits a healing skipshield while meditating. The healing applies to everything in its radius, not just his allies.
traits.name: psychicbowerbird

traits.description: Timmy has a far-reaching psychic influence that gradually improves relations with other factions.
traits.name: psychicbudgie

traits.description: Word psycasts used by Timmy have a profound influence on the target, breaking unwavering loyalty, reducing resistance, and altering mood and certainty.
traits.name: psychiccanary

traits.description: Timmy deals 2.2x damage with persona weapons, further increased by his own psychic sensitivity.
traits.name: psychiccassowary

traits.description: Timmy is a font of genius. he passively contributes to research at a rate scaling with his psychic sensitivity; if no research is currently underway, he instead gradually increases in skill and psyfocus.
traits.name: psychiccockatiel

traits.description: Timmy regenerates from wounds, even permanent ones, unnaturally fast. he can even come back from death, taking somewhere between 3-15 days.
traits.name: psychiccockroach

traits.description: While in water, Timmy moves faster and heals rapidly.
traits.name: psychiccranchiid

traits.description: Timmy moves with unearthly grace. he can walk with surety in the most treacherous bog, and evade even the fastest blows with ease.
traits.name: psychiccrane

traits.description: Timmy psychically influences others to love him more than almost anything else in existence.
traits.name: psychiccuckoo

traits.description:
Timmy repels vectors of harm on an abstract, indirect level. his mere existence has a 50% chance to prevent many kinds of bad events from happening.

Has no effect on events that occur as part of quests.
traits.name: deimaticpsychic

traits.description: Timmy is all but immune to high temperatures. In close-range combat, he repeatedly unleashes flame novas, and his psycasts drench hostile entities and structures in chemfuel.
traits.name: psychicdiabolus

traits.description: Timmy emits a continuous psychic soothe. his psycasts remove mental breaks from anyone affected.
traits.name: psychicdove

traits.description: Anyone whom Timmy kills is shortly thereafter raised in his service. This second life only lasts for three days; psychically deaf individuals, as well as those who are already under this effect, cannot be raised in this way.
traits.name: duloticpsychic

traits.description: Timmy radiates an aura of pain, and is unable to feel it himself. Foes who stay within the aura for too long also begin to lose consciousness.
traits.name: psychicechinoid

traits.description: Timmy regulates ambient temperature, enabling his allies to survive extreme heat or cold, and protecting them from fire.
traits.name: psychiceiderduck

traits.description: Timmy emanates electrical disturbances, charging nearby batteries, calling lightning on nearby foes with each psycast, and sending EMPs through anything he hits in melee.
traits.name: psychicelectrophorus

traits.description: Whenever Timmy undergoes an event that would awaken a latent psychic, a man in black appears. If he fulfills a condition that would awaken a latent psychic, there is a persistent but very small chance for men in black to appear nearby.
traits.name: psychicemperorpenguin

traits.description: Timmy ages so slowly as to be immortal. This effect also prevents him from developing cancer or geriatric diseases, and it reduces his reliance on food and rest.
traits.name: evergreenpsychic

traits.description: Timmy generates unique solar pinholes with each psycast - the light they emit debilitates foes that get too close. he can also see just fine in the dark, and is sustained by an exotic process akin to photosynthesis, greatly slowing his hunger so long as he is in bright light.
traits.name: psychicfirefly

traits.description: Timmy is favored by the flame. he is all but immune to high temperatures. While meditating, he emanates heat. his psycasts can set nearby foes ablaze and inflict heatstroke on the victims; when he strikes, his victims are scalded.
traits.name: psychicfirehawk

traits.description: Timmy is immune to fire, poison, and most environmental phenomena.
traits.name: psychicflamingo

traits.description:
Timmy can induce sudden and unnatural movements in his body, making him faster and better at dodging, allowing him to travel much farther with jump abilities, and even allowing him to leap great distances under his own power.

This power appears to be gravitic in nature, allowing him to cancel out the destructive effects of a gravship lift-off. To do this, he must remain on the ground while the ship takes off.
traits.name: psychicfodiator

traits.description:
Timmy has had his entire body replaced and augmented by a cyber-organic, archite-empowered material. he no longer bleeds, surgeries cannot fail on him, and his bodily functions are greatly enhanced.

his psychic potential has been stymied as a result of this change; he can no longer gain new transcendences.
traits.name: fossilizedpsychic

traits.description: Timmy can infrequently generate and fire arcing explosive projectiles over extreme distances.
traits.name: psychicfulmar

traits.description: Timmy causes ruptures in the fabric of space whenever he uses a skip psycast, damaging everything around the endpoint. The radius improves with his psylink level, up to level 6.
traits.name: psychicglowworm

traits.description: Timmy is immune to the harmful effects of most gases. he turns invisible while surrounded by gas, and his psycasts skip particulate into affected foes' eyes.
traits.name: psychicgnat

traits.description: Once a day, every day, Timmy regenerates towards a state of perfect health, becomes immune to the next instance of damage taken, and experiences a brief burst of euphoria. Even his worn apparel and wielded weapons are partially repaired each time this occurs.
traits.name: psychicgoldfinch

traits.description: Timmy is a giant among psycasters, boasting massively expanded psychic sensitivity.
traits.name: haastianpsychic

traits.description: Timmy can eat corpses to gain some of their skill experience, as well as potentially heal himself of an injury or ailment. The chance to heal scales with the corpse's body size. Moreover, he defers incoming damage to nearby corpses or undead entities.
traits.name: psychicharbinger

traits.description: Timmy moves faster, and has doubled range with skip psycasts.
traits.name: psychicheron

traits.description: Timmy produces food as a byproduct of psycasting. This ability seems to work on a small but constant level within his own body, helping sustain him.
traits.name: psychichoneybee

traits.description: Timmy can emit neural heat in the form of blasts of explosive energy, even while he is performing other tasks. This attack's range scales with his psychic sensitivity.
traits.name: psychichornet

traits.description: Timmy becomes invisible if he hasn't attacked or cast an ability recently.
traits.name: psychichummingbird

traits.description: Timmy has enhanced eyesight. he never gets bored of watching the stars, and using the telescope for long enough can cause a good event to occur.
traits.name: psychicindigobunting

traits.description: Timmy accelerates the growth of nearby plants and causes them to entangle nearby foes.
traits.name: psychicivy

traits.description: As Timmy meditates, he gets closer to creating a random good event.
traits.name: psychicjackdaw

traits.description: Timmy gains experience in each skill when psycasting or meditating.
traits.name: psychickea

traits.description: Timmy has impeccable accuracy - he nearly always hits his intended target, and can find the weakest spot in virtually any armor.
traits.name: psychickingfisher

traits.description: Timmy drains the life from nearby plants to replenish his own vitality, and he siphons psyfocus over time from nearby hostile psycasters.
traits.name: psychicknapweed

traits.description: Timmy inflicts heightened regeneration, toughness, and disease resistance on nearby allies.
traits.name: psychicladybug

traits.description: Timmy periodically skips high-quality meals to his own location. While meditating, his meditation focus gain rate speeds up this process.
traits.name: psychicleghorn

traits.description: Every 24 hours, Timmy manifests random allies - the higher his psychic sensitivity, the more allies are created. They're fragile and will disappear after 24 hours, but they're more psychically sensitive, and they don't need to eat or sleep.
traits.name: psychiclocust

traits.description: Timmy is a temporary manifestation and will soon disappear.
traits.name: psychiclocustspawn

traits.description: Timmy manifests a duplicate of himself. If it dies, he will recreate it after a delay, sped up by expending psyfocus or meditating. Artificial body parts cannot be removed from the duplicate.
traits.name: psychiclovebug

traits.description:
Timmy is a doppelganger of another entity. If slain, he will disappear and later respawn from the original.

It is not possible to remove any artificial body parts he may have.
traits.name: psychicdoppelganger

traits.description: Timmy manifests additional rewards when a quest is completed.
traits.name: psychicmagpie

traits.description: Timmy is subject to a bizarre temporal distortion, which enables him to sleep and meditate faster. It also makes his ability cooldowns recover three times as fast.
traits.name: psychicmayfly

traits.description: Timmy has an incredibly powerful mind, and he emits a cerebral effect that stimulates learning and improves psychic sensitivity.
traits.name: psychicmeerkat

traits.description: Timmy shrinks after spending enough time meditating. In this state, he is invisible to the naked eye and can move through ordinarily impassable obstacles. he returns to normal size on attacking or casting an ability.
traits.name: psychicmite

traits.description:
Timmy removes blood from anyone affected by his psycasts, restoring his own body and hemogen based on the amount of blood removed. This effect cannot kill directly, as it will never bring a victim's blood loss above 50%.

Additionally, he cannot lose blood from open injuries.
traits.name: psychicmosquito

traits.description: Timmy gains psyfocus from the act of eating, and ingesting enough nutrition may produce a random serum.
traits.name: psychicmusang

traits.description: Timmy gains experience by psychically copying the skills of nearby higher-leveled individuals. he may also rarely learn psycasts from other psycasters by conversing with them.
traits.name: psychichillmynah

traits.description: Timmy is a better speaker and regains all but the last 10% of psyfocus spent on Word psycasts.
traits.name: psychicnightingale

traits.description: Timmy becomes more physically and psychically powerful while in the dark, but wilts in the light. Becoming inspired or entering a mental break will always coincide with an eclipse.
traits.name: psychicnoctule

traits.description: Timmy gains armor, vigor, and neural heat recovery rate as it gets colder.
traits.name: psychicnotothen

traits.description: Whenever Timmy psycasts, it creates a zone at the target's position in which his cognition and psychic sensitivity are enhanced. Only one such zone may exist at any time.
traits.name: psychicoilbird

traits.description:
Whenever Timmy psycasts, nearby plants grow faster, and nearby non-hostile buildings are repaired. The effect scales with his psychic sensitivity.

Psycasting will also heal one random injury from a nearby random pawn; the heal's strength scales with the recipient's psychic sensitivity.
traits.name: psychicorbweaver

traits.description: While in water, Timmy moves faster and is protected from damage. Blasts of water emit from the location of his psycasts.
traits.name: psychicorca

traits.description: Timmy exudes a protective presence, flatly reducing the damage nearby allies take and slowing their fatigue.
traits.name: psychicosprey

traits.description:
Timmy intermittently psychically tames a random animal. This effect can occur over long distances, and its frequency is based on his psychic sensitivity.

When he affects an animal with a psycast, its health is either boosted (if non-hostile) or impaired (if hostile).
traits.name: psychicoxpecker

traits.description: Timmy exudes an aura which improves the vision of allies near him and makes everything it touches look gorgeous.
traits.name: psychicpeacock

traits.description: Timmy can see, attack, and cast abilities from much further away.
traits.name: psychicpelican

traits.description: Timmy nearly always stuns any foe he harms with an attack. The duration scales with the victim's psychic sensitivity.
traits.name: psychicperegrine

traits.description: Timmy receives detailed extrasensory impressions of his surroundings. This new mode of perception increases dramatically in potency during meditation or psycasting.
traits.name: psychicpipistrelle

traits.description: Timmy is immune to most forms of toxicity, which includes chemical overdoses, addictions, and dependencies; food poisoning; and, to a meager extent, disease. he can cure someone of any such afflictions (except for diseases) by affecting them with a psycast.
traits.name: psychicpitohui

traits.description: Timmy is heavily resistant to disease and toxins. While meditating, he reshapes the surrounding terrain, drying, fertilizing, and unpolluting it.
traits.name: psychicpolux

traits.description: Timmy can survive for long periods of time without air, food, water, rest, or fun, and he emits an effect that partially alleviates these needs in others as well.
traits.name: psychicpoorwill

traits.description: When Timmy is happy, those near him gain a variety of benefits; when he is sad, nearby foes are demoralized and aggravated.
traits.name: psychicptarmigan

traits.description: Timmy constructively shapes inanimate material around himself. his worn and wielded equipment is repaired over time. There is a small chance, while meditating, for part of his gear to improve in quality, or for the spontaneous creation of a high-quality book or sculpture.
traits.name: psychicquahog

traits.description:
Timmy is surrounded by a field of selectively weakened gravity, allowing him and nearby allies to hover (allowing them to ignore terrain movement penalties), and preventing them from triggering traps.

This gravitic field also cancels out the destructive effects of a gravship lift-off. To do this, he must remain on the ground while the ship takes off.
traits.name: psychicquelea

traits.description: Timmy broadcasts a psychic serenity detectable by animals, improving his interactions with them, preventing them from harming him, and even causing his psycasts to cure affected animals' scaria.
traits.name: psychicquokka

traits.description: Timmy sometimes receives extrasensory visions of distant places and the near future, which he leverages to reveal good events afterward.
traits.name: psychicraven

traits.description: Timmy moves faster and has an esoteric sense that randomly points him toward objects of interest in the wilderness. This sense is useful for finding treasure while traveling in a moving caravan.
traits.name: psychicrobin

traits.description: Timmy derives more usable material from harvesting plants, butchering animals, and mining. Animals he extracts resources from regrow that material quicker, and when fishing he ends up with more fish than were actually caught.
traits.name: psychicrook

traits.description: Timmy is surrounded by a barrier which transforms incoming damage into neural heat. If he overloads his neural heat limit, the barrier will vanish for a day, though it can be regenerated far faster via meditation.
traits.name: psychicscarab

traits.description: Timmy produces luciferium by psycasting.
traits.name: scarletpsychic

traits.description: Timmy has a vast "extradimensional" storage achieved through the use of a personal skipgate system. When he meditates, random items may be added to this storage.
traits.name: psychicscrubjay

traits.description: Timmy is favored by the cold. he is all but immune to cold temperatures. While meditating, he saps heat from the environment. his very presence chills his foes; when he strikes, his victims suffer from hypothermia.
traits.name: seaicepsychic

traits.description: Timmy can manipulate the weather. he also hovers, allowing him to ignore the pathing costs of terrain.
traits.name: psychicshearwater

traits.description: Timmy has a chance to cause good events to occur on killing another person. he also gains psyfocus from killing other beings.
traits.name: psychicshrike

traits.description: Timmy summons an insect hive every time he spends 20% psyfocus, and his presence pacifies all but the largest insectoids. A pacified insectoid behaves like a wild animal, though it doesn't wander very far, and even if it was originally protecting a hive it will no longer take care of it.
traits.name: psychicspelopede

traits.description: Timmy has a 75% chance to avoid damage. Even when he is struck, the blow glances.
traits.name: psychicstoat

traits.description: Every 1000% psyfocus Timmy spends causes another entity to appear somewhere nearby. This new entity is allied with him and comes from a similar background.
traits.name: psychicstork

traits.description: Timmy has a chance to inflict madness upon foes he affects with psycasts. More psychically sensitive victims are more vulnerable, but psylink levels reduce susceptibility to the effect.
traits.name: psychicstrix

traits.description: Timmy is physically, mentally, and psychically empowered by being in a romantic relationship (or unconditionally, if aromantic). his romantic partners and bonded animals receive a physical and mood buff too.
traits.name: psychicswan

traits.description: While Timmy has no neural heat, his movement speed is vastly increased.
traits.name: psychicswift

traits.description: Timmy gains various physical qualities based on his artistic skill.
traits.name: psychictanager

traits.description: Timmy deals high damage to buildings and mines much faster. Additionally, enemy buildings near the locus of his psycasts take high damage; higher-level psycasts result in a wider radius.
traits.name: psychictermite

traits.description: While on a caravan, Timmy covers impossible distances in mere moments.
traits.name: psychicarctictern

traits.description: Timmy augments his melee attacks with skipgates that excise material from the victim, dealing bonus damage that ignores armor and most forms of damage resistance.
traits.name: psychicthrumbo

traits.description: Timmy turns invisible, phases through obstacles, and moves faster for a short while after being hit (even if the hit did no damage).
traits.name: psychictouch-me-not

traits.description: Timmy makes nearby foes more vulnerable to caustic or toxic agents. When harmed, he poisons nearby enemies, with a small chance to inflict acid burn.
traits.name: psychictoxbuzzard

traits.description: Timmy grows in size over time, making him more physically powerful. Spending psyfocus reverses this transformation to some extent.
traits.name: psychicuhu

traits.description: Random corpses appear near Timmy as he spends psyfocus.he also cannot be harmed by the living dead, such as ghouls or shamblers.
traits.name: psychicvulture

traits.description: Timmy benefits from weaker versions of multiple inspirations at once. Those affected by his psycasts may become inspired as well.
traits.name: psychicsedgewarbler

traits.description:
Timmy periodically skips psychically tamed animals of a specific type to his location. This effect occurs faster while meditating. New animals won't be summoned if doing so would cause the sum body size of all current ones to exceed twice his psylink level.

This skipgate system also gradually helps replenish local populations of fish.
traits.name: psychicwarqueen

traits.description: Timmy has supernatural craftsmanship. his creations are a quality level higher and there is a 50% chance that any item with quality that he creates is duplicated.
traits.name: psychicweaverbird

traits.description: A walking portent of death, Timmy terrifies foes in a vast radius, and those closer to him may even be struck by an uncontrollable urge to flee. he is also nearly immune to stress.
traits.name: psychicwhalehead

traits.description: Timmy can pass through solid obstacles while his psyfocus is greater than 35%.
traits.name: psychicwoodpecker

traits.description: Timmy is supernaturally gifted at healing. he heals anyone he tends to and always succeeds at surgery. he also somehow acquires herbal medicine after spending 10% psyfocus or meditating for long enough.
traits.name: psychicxerigium

traits.description: Timmy can focus to generate bolts of energy which spring towards a targeted foe.
traits.name: psychicyellowjacket

traits.description:
When another psycaster or latent psychic dies nearby, Timmy partakes of their dissipating psychic thalergy and accumulates a 'hoard' of energy. This energy strengthens his psycasting and health, while also shielding him from harm. However, the energy lessens whenever it prevents damage. More powerful psycasters grant more energy.

he also cannot be directly affected by his enemies' psycasts.
traits.name: psychicdragon

traits.description: Timmy is more thought than flesh. his physical and mental attributes are greatly amplified by his psychic sensitivity, and his psychic potency is further boosted by the total psylink level of all nearby psycasters.
traits.name: psychicegregore

traits.description: Timmy can strip the psychic sensitivity from others. A second application of this ability kills the victim, extracting some of their psylinks. Awakened psychics cannot be killed by this ability.
traits.name: psychicerinys

traits.description: Ordinary food does little for Timmy, but eating a psycaster will fully sate him for a long while as well as possibly grant a psylink level. On eating the corpse of a fellow awakened or transcendent psychic, he will assimilate all of their awakenings and up to one of their transcendences.
traits.name: psychicharpy

traits.description: Timmy gains increasing potency as a psycaster the longer he lives, develops a new awakening every six years, and gradually develops further transcendent powers over the course of his lifetime.
traits.name: psychicleviathan

traits.description: Timmy can bring the dead back to life, though each beneficiary must spend at least 24 hours alive before this power can be used on them again. If he dies, he will automatically cast it on himself.
traits.name: psychicphoenix

traits.description: Allies near Timmy are invulnerable to direct harm, but almost totally unable to deal direct damage. he experiences a less pronounced version of the effects, and can be harmed. On death, he will pass this ability on to another of the same faction.
traits.name: psychicseraph

traits.description: Timmy can assert permanent mental control over others. The cooldown scales with the victim's market value.
traits.name: psychicsiren

traits.description: Timmy can grant psylink levels to others. This power always succeeds on non-psycasters, but is likelier to fail the more psylink levels the target has. A target who fails three times dies.
traits.name: psychicsphinx

traits.description: Timmy can start others on the path to psychic awakening, induce awakening in a latent psychic, or even grant a second awakening to another.
traits.name: psychicthunderbird

traits.description: When Timmy is slain, he will transfer his consciousness into someone else, replacing their mind with his own. For 24 hours afterward, he will be invulnerable to anything other than persona weapons, but will not be able to transfer to a new body.
traits.name: psychicwraith

traits.description: Timmy can call down destructive pillars of pulverizing force. he accumulates the energy to do so passively, but can speed this process up by meditating. he may also manifest an even more destructive effect, potent enough to obliterate cities, but this requires many days of meditation to charge.
traits.name: psychicziz

traits.description:
Timmy is steadfastly loyal to his faction. he tries harder to get along with his compatriots and will never bail on them.

If imprisoned, he will be exceptionally uncooperative with his captors.
stats: Giving up and leaving mental state disabled.
Giving up and leaving mental state disabled.

traits.name: allegiant

traits.description: Timmy doesn't care for conversation. he doesn't chitchat with others, never engages in social recreation, and doesn't enjoy parties. he doesn't mind it when others slight or insult him - it's just words, after all.
traits.name: asocial

traits.description: Timmy is driven to great heights by thoughts of those dear to him. he works harder, learns faster, and becomes more resistant to pain and stress based on the total strength of his positive relationships.
traits.name: champion

traits.description: Timmy is a master of small talk; speaking with others grants them a stacking mood bonus. If he goes on a mental break, it is likely to be an insulting spree.
traits.name: conversationalist

traits.description: Timmy is exceptionally skilled at basic tasks, but struggles with advanced concepts. Except for shooting, melee, and social, his skills degrade rapidly while above level 10.
traits.name: drudge

traits.description: Looking at corpses makes Timmy happy, and he doesn't mind wearing tainted apparel.
traits.name: graver

traits.description: Timmy is filled with vigor. he is difficult to harm, and is quick to bounce back from exhaustion, injury, and illness.
traits.name: hale

traits.description: Timmy goes into exaggerated histrionics when below his mental break threshold, stressing out anyone who can see or hear him.
traits.name: hysteric

traits.description: Timmy is quick to assume the worst of other people. his opinions of others are much more strongly influenced by negative impressions than positive ones.
traits.name: judgemental

traits.description: Timmy loves being in the water. he enjoys getting wet, and swims quite quickly.
traits.name: mariner

traits.description: Timmy has an inexplicably robust metabolism. he doesn't need to eat as often and never gets food poisoning. So long as the food isn't raw, he also doesn't care what it is.
stats: Binging on food mental state disabled.
Binging on food mental state disabled.

traits.name: metabolicfreak

traits.description: Timmy craves the approval of those he knows. he is happy when others like him, and sad when they don't.
traits.name: peoplepleaser

traits.description: Timmy harbors an extremely dangerous dark side which comes out when he starts to lose control. While stressed or in a mental break, he becomes much faster, stronger, and harder to subdue; during such an episode, any damage he takes may cause him to go berserk.
traits.name: repressedrage

traits.description: Timmy gains mood and has a chance to become inspired when other people mentally break or socially fight. However, this tends not to endear him to those people.
traits.name: sadistic

traits.description: Timmy is quite adept at evading detection. he doesn’t leave tracks and is difficult to spot. he even helps mask the passage of caravans he is part of.
traits.name: skulker

traits.description: Timmy can pick out targets at further distances than anyone else. However, he is less talented at close-quarters combat, and he feels unsafe without a ranged weapon.
traits.name: sniper

traits.description: Timmy lacks some sort of ineffable inner spark. he won't recreate, doesn't care for beauty, and can't become inspired.
traits.name: staid

traits.description: Timmy luxuriates in the sunlight, and loves soaking up its rays. Being in direct sunlight makes him happier but also makes him work slower.
traits.name: sunbather

traits.description: Timmy loves turbulent weather. he receives a slight mood boost when the weather acts up, and exotic conditions like eclipses, auroras, or even toxic fallout bring him great joy.
traits.name: tempestophile

traits.description: Timmy places great importance on the wearing of garments. he dislikes being naked, and thinks poorly of others for not covering up at all times. he also can't stand wearing tattered apparel, so he takes good care of what he wears.
traits.name: textile

traits.description:
Timmy is utterly at peace. he will not participate in violence, and can't mentally break. Ever.



For technical reasons, this trait does not actually disable violence until the game starts.
traits.name: tranquil

traits.description:
Timmy doesn’t feel the need to be in a community. If things get too bad, or if he experiences a random surge of wanderlust, he will leave.

If imprisoned, he will be uncooperative with his captors.
traits.name: vagabond

traits.description: Timmy is obsessed with his own appearance. his beauty and the quality of his apparel impact his mood.
traits.name: vain

traits.description: Violent intent builds up within Timmy, causing his mood to worsen until he unleashes it in a savage, lethal burst.
traits.name: vicious

traits.description: Timmy intuitively leans into the strengths of any weapon he wields, gaining different bonuses depending on the currently wielded weapon’s nature.
traits.name: weaponartist
