traits.description: Timmy has high expectations at minimum. When they are met, he loses motivation, so he works and learns slower.
traits.name: entitled

traits.description: Timmy has high expectations at minimum. When they are met, he becomes motivated, so he works and learns faster.
traits.name: prideful

traits.description: Timmy pays less attention to his senses than most. Though this is mostly disadvantageous, he can sleep soundly through anything, as well as weather more trying temperatures.
traits.name: imperceptive

traits.description: Timmy has very sharp senses. Though this is mostly a boon, it also makes him more sensitive to comfort, discomfort and extreme temperatures.
traits.name: keensenses

traits.description: Timmy has senses almost on par with bionic augmentation. Though this is mostly a boon, it also makes him more sensitive to comfort, discomfort and extreme temperatures.
traits.name: powerfulsenses

traits.description: Timmy hones his body to a state of notable physical fitness, allowing him to carry more and hit harder.
traits.name: mighty

traits.description: Timmy is immensely, ridiculously strong, allowing him to carry far more and hit far harder.
traits.name: herculean

traits.description: Timmy is so gullible it beggars belief. he is very strongly affected by his ideoligion, yet is also very susceptible to conversion attempts.
traits.name: overlycredulous

traits.description: Timmy believes almost anything anyone tells him. he is strongly affected by his ideoligion, yet is also susceptible to conversion attempts.
traits.name: credulous

traits.description: Timmy has nearly unshakable faith in his ideoligion. he is strongly affected by his ideoligion, and is very resistant to conversion attempts.
traits.name: adherent

traits.description: Timmy spends every breath in service of his ideoligion. he is very strongly affected by his ideoligion, and is immune to conversion attempts.
stats: Crisis of belief mental state disabled.
Crisis of belief mental state disabled.

traits.name: unquestioningadherent

traits.description: Timmy is chronically uncertain about everything; he is less affected by his ideoligion.
traits.name: doubtful

traits.description: Timmy dislikes and distrusts anyone who doesn't believe the things he does. Conversion attempts upset him, and changing to a new ideo frightens him terribly.
traits.name: intolerant

traits.description: Timmy doesn’t just want to be above others - he needs others to be far beneath him. he can be satisfied by holding a position of authority or by the presence of enough slaves.
traits.name: subjugator

traits.description:
Timmy believes freedom is a right everyone should enjoy. he disapproves of slavery, and, to a lesser extent, imprisonment of anyone he knows.

If imprisoned, he will be uncooperative with his captors.
traits.name: liberator

traits.description: For Timmy, maintaining ideoligious solidarity is more important than embracing the truth. he will never be in the ideoligious minority for longer than two days; he then converts to whatever the most people in the faction he belongs to (or is enslaved by) believes.
traits.name: conformist

traits.description: Timmy projects a sense of wisdom, allowing him to use the abilities of a moral guide. If he actually has the moral guide role, he will have two copies of the ability set, on separate cooldowns.
traits.name: guru

traits.description: Timmy feels restless and unhappy when his ideoligion is in the majority. Conversely, he works harder and is more determined when in the minority.
traits.name: persecutioncomplex

traits.description: Timmy believes in a wide variety of superstitions. As he randomly comes across what he believes to be omens, his mood will fluctuate.
traits.name: superstitious

traits.description: Timmy really dislikes and distrusts children and pregnant people.
traits.name: misopedist

traits.description: Timmy believes that children are the most important thing in the universe. he enjoys taking care of them; living in a place without kids makes him feel empty.
traits.name: caretaker

traits.description: Timmy likes having mechanoids around. he will be saddened if an allied mechanoid dies.
traits.name: mechaphile

traits.description: Timmy hates mechanoids, and he dislikes and distrusts those who control them. This antipathy is so strong that he can project it to discombobulate mechanoids, provided he has the means to broadcast on their bandwidth.
traits.name: mechaphobe

traits.description: Timmy thinks the beauty and health of the land should be preserved. he despises pollution, and appreciates being anywhere without its taint.
traits.name: environmentalist

traits.description: Timmy is fascinated with the idea of the world ending. Climate calamities, incoming planetkillers, and rising anomalous activity will all improve his mood.
traits.name: catastrophist

traits.description: Timmy is linked to a dark influence. The further it influences reality, the more sensitive he becomes to the supernatural... but it also takes a toll on his sanity.
traits.name: corruptible

traits.description: Timmy cares less about others and is prone to saying macabre, disturbing things when stressed to the breaking point. he is unperturbed by monsters and corpses, and has no issue with using either for sustenance or apparel. Ultimately, he feels restrained by his humanity - and if he has an extreme mental break, he might just free himself from it.
traits.name: twisted

traits.description: Timmy hates aerial travel of any kind, and doesn't like being in space. These things make him nauseous.
traits.name: earthborne

traits.description:
Fishing makes Timmy happy, and his skill at fishing makes him half as prone to fumble a catch or get hurt by a fish. However, he will be sad if there are no fish nearby.

If he is a psycaster, he will find fishing sufficiently meditative to gain 3% psyfocus per fishing attempt.
traits.name: angler

traits.description: Timmy moves in a strange way. he is a little awkward in surface gravity, but becomes more graceful out in space.
traits.name: celestialcelerity

traits.description: Timmy wants to witness all the wonders of the world. he gains a permanent mood bonus per unique biome or landmark feature visited.
traits.name: globetrotter

traits.description: Timmy has an impressive sense of direction, as well as great situational awareness. he rarely gets lost, surprised by traps, or otherwise inconvenienced by difficulties during travel.
traits.name: navigator

traits.description: Timmy enjoys eating fish.
traits.name: pescatarian

traits.description: Timmy takes more time to aim when shooting. he shoots less often than others, but with more accuracy.
traits.name: carefulshooter

traits.description: Pew! Pew! Pew! Timmy just likes pulling the trigger. he shoots faster than others, but less accurately.
traits.name: trigger-happy

traits.description: Timmy knows how to handle a firearm, and can shoot both quickly and accurately.
traits.name: deadshot

races.description: A baseline human, mostly unmodified by gene engineering and mostly unchanged by evolutionary pressures on non-Earth planets.
races.name: human

races.description: A baseline human, mostly unmodified by gene engineering and mostly unchanged by evolutionary pressures on non-Earth planets.
races.name: human
